53.「合コンってのは 『合同懇親教練』の略ネ。| 学園の 歴史ある課外活動らしいんだ:
A blind date is a joint get-together. It's an|extracurricular activity with a long history|at the school, but it's a bit of a hassle, so|
|we just call it a party. In a blind date, a|group of students from the same class form a|party and fight off the toughest demons...|
|It's a great way to build up your body and|mind.They may be demons, but they're really good|teachers, so there's no need to be afraid.|You won't get wiped out... If you don't have|
|four friends, I'll match you up with someone|who does, so feel free to join in solo!

54.「合コンに参加するには チケットが必要だよ。| 購買部で 教練チケットってのが|:
You need a ticket to get into the party. You|can buy them in the purchasing department.|The proceeds from the ticket sales will be|
|used to pay for the activities of our blind|date team, so please cooperate with us there.And this is important! If one of us has a|ticket, the others in the party can join|without a ticket! That's it! The person who|
|has the ticket becomes the party leader, and|invites his or her friends to join the party.|The ticket will be collected if you|
|successfully win... Even if you lose, you|won't lose your tickets, so keep trying!

55.「合コン相手は いくつかランクがあるの。| ざっくり言うと 相手をやっつける難易:
There are a few different ranks of blind|dates. To put it bluntly, they're difficult|to defeat. The type of pure jewels you can|
|take home changes depending on the rank you|choose... I think I'd recommend bronze for|starters.Ah! As the seasons change, special blind|dates are set up for the Night Fest, which|you can attend without a ticket.It's a badass night where you can drop|special opponents and get the coolest jewels!

56.「合コンに勝利すると ピュアジュエルってのが| もらえるよー。学園で使える装備を:
When you win a party, you get pure jewels...|It's the motto for making equipment that can|be used at the school and for evolving...|
|That's not good! You can join the party solo,|but if you join a party with other girls from|your class, can you take home a little extra|
|Pure Jewels? And yes, you have to be in the|same classroom to party with your classmates,|so please keep that in mind. The Pure Jewels|
|are managed by us, so feel free to talk to|us... We're going to have a lot of blind|dates and get some cool weapons.|

|join us solo!
